## Intro

here is some background info blah blah


```{r,load data}

x <- read.table("PMC 2019 - analysis.tsv",header=TRUE,fill=TRUE,sep="\t")
head(x)
colnames(x)
dim(x)

# omics type
omics <- x$Omics.type
omics_split <- strsplit(omics,", ")
omics <- unlist(omics_split)
table(omics)

# organism
org <- x$Organism
org_split <- strsplit(org,", ")
org <- unlist(org_split)
table(org)

# Gene set library
GSL <-x$Gene.set.library
GSL_split <- strsplit(GSL,", ")
GSL <- unlist(GSL_split)
table(GSL)

# App used
App <-x$App.used
App_split <- strsplit(App,", ")
App <- unlist(App_split)
table(App)

# Gene set version
GSV <-x$GS.version
table(GSV)






```
